11.content:
You watched from on top of your bed with a shocked expression!! Everything around you looked absolutely massive in size!! You felt so small, so insignificant. You had to get these thoughts out of your head. You needed help and help wasn’t going to come for you. You had to go find it yourself. You started to make your way down the edge of your enormous bed. It seemed like it would take miles to get to the other side.

BOOM!!

You flew forward a little. . . a shocking earthquake pushing you from what felt like. .

BOOM!!
Again, you flew forward a little. Getting yourself up, you peeked towards your door way. Your eyes grew wide!! Before you was a massive giantess. . and it wasn’t just any giantess. . it was your own mother!!

BOOM!!

Your mother casually entered the room, scanning the floor as she had one hand on her hip. A small sigh left her body.

“Oh, where is he? Sweetie, are you here?”

She was so massive!! She looked like she was about 800 feet high!! Judging from your surroundings and how far it would take you to walk down the bed normally, you realized that you must be around half an inch tall!! Your mother was wearing a long silk black nightie which covered her curvy body well. Even with the slightly baggy clothes, you could see your mom’s enormous rack and a bit of cleavage peaking out from the top of her nightie. Your friends had always joked that you had the best milf for a mom. Still, at this size, fear filled you more than any possible arousal at your gigantic mom.

BOOM!

BOOM!

Crawling forward on the gigantic bed, you watched your mother entered into your bedroom with one tremendous step after another. Each foot fall caused a massive quaking effect which shook you, even on top of the bed.

You felt a sigh of relief. Your mother would know what to do. No doubt this was the work of your evil bitch sister, Luna. You knew for a fact that she had invented some kind of shrinking ray, so she must have used it on you during the night.

Moving forward to get her attention, you rushed towards the far side of your bed. It wasn’t much closer since your mom’s foot falls had moved you a bit. It seemed you were at the very least, a little more durable at this size. You didn’t want to test how durable, but being thrown around didn’t seem to hurt you too much at least. You jumped up and down, waving like a mad person. Screaming, shouting, and making as much noise as you can, you noticed that she seemed oblivious. At your incredibly tiny size, she didn’t seem to notice you.

“Look at this room!” your mother complained, her two hands on her hips.

“He’s gonna get it from me, when I get ahold of him!”

BOOM!

BOOM!

The stomping continued but with her being in such close proximity. . you realized that you were being pushed forward. . and off the bed!! Falling towards the edge of your blankets, you slid down what felt like miles and miles of soft linen until you were at ground level. The acceleration of the blanket “slide” was so much though as it flung you forward. . right towards your mom’s gigantic feet!! And she was still coming this way!!

BOOM!

BOOM!

With two simple steps she was right over you, each foot covering so much more distance than you could possibly move in even an hours time!! The shaking and noise was so loud and powerful though, that you fell to your knees in fear. You had to snap out of it though. . . or you’d be crushed for sure!!
Adrenaline filling your body, you get back on your feet and start making a mad dash away from her. She wasn’t going to be able to help you much if you were squished underneath her gigantic feet! You ran towards your blanket as your 800 foot mother took another step forward.

WHAM!!

The footfall sent you flying forward, back a little towards your blanket. You turn around and look at the gigantic creature. She was almost on you!!

You could only watch as the gigantic barefoot came crashing at you. . coming for you and the hardwood floor! Closing your eyes, you couldn’t bare to watch.

SLAAM!!!

The impact was so incredible that you felt it throughout your whole body. The floor groaned from the incredible footfall and you were again flung, only this time away from the blanket and right between your mother’s legs. You landed on the hard floor with a thud as what looked like a cloud of dust erupted around you. Your mother was right. . you really did need to clean.

The presence of the goddess was too much. You looked straight up. . right up her nightgown. You felt your heart grow weary. She wasn’t wearing any underwear! Her shaved vagina and enormous ass were right in view. You were transfixed, totally ignoring the fact that you could be crushed at any moment. You felt a little naughty looking at this. Closing your eyes, you shook your head. You had to stay focused.

“Son!?!” the mighty giantess bellowed through the sky above, “Are you here? Where are you?”

The sound of her voice was both soft and loving while simultaneously frightening and horrifying. You remained between her two legs, frozen in fear. .. still staring upwards towards your mom’s privates. You had to snap out of this and do something. . and fast!!

She looked good though. Even though your mom was 40, she looked a lot younger and staring at her now made you realize this more. You watched as your mom’s lips pursed together as she squinted to get a better look at you.

You get up to your feet fast, this was your only chance!! You jumped up and down again, doing very non “bug” activities so your mom wouldn’t get the wrong idea. Fear still gripping your chest, you went wild screaming too. . adrenaline rushing through you.

You hoped to god this would work. It had too, or you’d be in a lot of trouble!!
